src:
Sekarang Giliran Aplikasi Ovo yang Error
05 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Fitraya Ramadhanny - detikInet


Foto: ovo

Jakarta - Hari ini rupanya ada beberapa layanan digital yang bermasalah. Kali ini giliran Ovo yang error.Para pengguna layanan pembayaran digital Ovo langsung ramai di lini masa Twitter, Selasa (5/11/2019). Maklum, siang hari ini user sedang sangat aktif kegiatannya, mulai dari makan siang sampai kebutuhan pembayaran lainnya.Masalahnya, mereka tidak bisa melakukan pembayaran dengan Ovo. Bahkan beberapa malah sign out dan tidak bisa login.









detikcom pun masih berusaha menghubungi pihak Ovo untuk mendapatkan jawaban resmi. Sementara dari pihak Ovo sudah merespons beberapa user. Ovo mengatakan ada proses maintenance.




Simak Video "Rudiantara Semringah Sambut OVO Jadi Unicorn Kelima Indonesia"

[Gambas:Video 20detik]

text:
Now it's Ovo Application's Error Error
05 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Fitraya Ramadhanny - detikInet


Photo: ovo

Jakarta - Today apparently there are some digital services that have problems. This time it was Ovo's turn to be in error. Users of Ovo's digital payment service immediately crowded on Twitter's timeline on Tuesday (11/5/2019). Understandably, this afternoon the user is very active in its activities, ranging from lunch to other payment needs. The problem is, they cannot make payments with Ovo. Some even signed out and could not log in.









AFP is still trying to contact Ovo to get an official answer. While Ovo has responded to several users. Ovo said there was a maintenance process.




Check out the video "Rudiantara Semringah Welcomes OVO to Become Indonesia's Fifth Unicorn"

[Gambas: 20sec video]
